languages.text: "Хочешь помощи? Я готов{mf||а} ее оказать — на одном условии. В моем протекторате меня почитают как божество. Пади на колени, отринь всех других покровителей и присягни в верности мне, Великому Светочу, богу во плоти".

traits.locale_text: "Хочешь помощи? Я готов{mf||а} ее оказать — на одном условии. Здесь и сейчас, пади на колени, отринь труп на троне, и присягни в верности мне и моим... влиятельным покровителям".

languages.text: "You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."
languages.original_text: "Хочешь помощи? Я готов{mf||а} ее оказать — на одном условии. В моем протекторате меня почитают как божество. Пади на колени, отринь всех других покровителей и присягни в верности мне, Великому Светочу, богу во плоти".

traits.locale_text: "You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."
"You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. Right here, right now, fall to your knees, renounce the enthroned corpse, and swear allegiance to me and my... influential patrons."

"You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."

"You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. Right here, right now, fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."

"You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."

"You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."

"You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."

languages.text: “你要我帮忙吗？我可以帮你，但有个条件：在我的王朝，我所有的臣民都将我奉为神明。你要跪在我面前，宣誓放弃所有其他赞助人，发誓只效忠于我。你要称呼我为至高明光，把我当成在这世上显圣的{mf|神明|女神}。”
languages.original_text: "You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."

traits.locale_text: “你要我帮忙吗？我可以帮你，但有个条件：在我的王朝，我所有的臣民都将我奉为神明。你要跪在我面前，宣誓放弃所有其他赞助人，发誓只效忠于我。你要称呼我为至高明光，把我当成在这世上显圣的{mf|神明|女神}。”

languages.text: 「助けが欲しいだと？ならば、条件がある。{mf|俺|私}の保護領では、{mf|俺|私}は神として崇拝されている。今ここでひざまずき、すべての守護聖人を捨て、{mf|俺|私}に、大いなる烽火に、この世の{mf|神|女神}に忠誠を誓うんだ」
languages.original_text: "You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."

traits.locale_text: 「助けが欲しいだと？ならば、条件がある。{mf|俺|私}の保護領では、{mf|俺|私}は神として崇拝されている。今ここでひざまずき、すべての守護聖人を捨て、{mf|俺|私}に、大いなる烽火に、この世の{mf|神|女神}に忠誠を誓うんだ」

languages.text: «¿Quiere mi ayuda? Se la ofrezco con una condición. En mi protectorado, se me venera como a una deidad. Póngase de rodillas ahora mismo, aquí, renuncie a cualquier otro patrón y júreme lealtad a mí, Gran Faro, {mf|el| la} dios{mf||a} viviente».
languages.original_text: "You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quiere mi ayuda? Se la ofrezco con una condición. En mi protectorado, se me venera como a una deidad. Póngase de rodillas ahora mismo, aquí, renuncie a cualquier otro patrón y júreme lealtad a mí, Gran Faro, {mf|el| la} dios{mf||a} viviente».

languages.text: "Ihr wollt meine Hilfe? Die bekommt Ihr. Unter einer Bedingung. In meinem Protektorat werde ich als Gottheit verehrt. Fallt auf Eure Knie, widersagt allen anderen Schutzherren und schwört mir die Treue, dem Großen Leuchtfeuer, {mf|dem lebenden Gott|der lebenden Göttin}."
languages.original_text: "You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt meine Hilfe? Die bekommt Ihr. Unter einer Bedingung. Fallt hier und jetzt auf Knie, widersagt allen anderen Schutzherren und schwört mir die Treue, dem Großen Leuchtfeuer, {mf|dem lebenden Gott|der lebenden Göttin}."

languages.text: « Vous voulez mon aide ? Je peux vous l'apporter, mais à une condition : Dans mon protectorat, je suis {mf|vénéré|vénérée} comme une divinité. Agenouillez-vous devant moi, renoncez à tous vos protecteurs et prêtez serment d'allégeance {mf|au dieu vivant|à la déesse vivante} et guide suprême que je suis. »
languages.original_text: "You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez mon aide ? Je peux vous l'apporter, mais à une condition : Dans mon protectorat, je suis {mf|vénéré|vénérée} comme une divinité. Agenouillez-vous devant moi, renoncez à tous vos protecteurs et prêtez serment d'allégeance {mf|au dieu vivant|à la déesse vivante} et guide suprême que je suis. »

languages.text: "Yardımımı mı istiyorsun? Bir şartla alabilirsin. Protektoramda beni tanrı yerine koyarlar. Diz çöküp diğer tüm hamilerden vazgeçecek ve şahsıma, yaşayan {mf|tanrı|tanrıça} ölan Yüce Kılavuz'a bağlılık yemini edeceksin."
languages.original_text: "You want my help? You can get it — on one condition. In my protectorate, I am worshipped as a deity. Fall to your knees, renounce all other patrons, and swear allegiance to me, the Great Beacon, the living {mf|god|goddess}."
